extensionDescription.message: Provides ability to stick some state tabs to tab bar edges automatically, for Tree Style Tab.

config_autoStickyTab_caption.message: Tabs stuck to edges of the tab bar when they are scrolled out

config_stickyPreviouslyActiveTabExceptPi.message: Never clear "previously active" state of tabs while pinned tabs are activated

config_allowScrollToActivatedStickedTab_.message: Scroll to the original location of the tab when a stuck tab is activated
